articles.description: Tech YouTuber MKBHD reveals the words Apple deliberately avoids using during presentations, including "Artificial Intelligence" and "Virtual Reality," as part of their control and narrative-shaping strategy.
articles.content: Tech YouTuber Marques Brownlee AKA MKBHD, has shed some light on Apple Inc.'s AAPL unique approach to presentations, highlighting the words that the tech giant deliberately avoids using especially wh… [+2368 chars]
